s: September 1, 2024 - In my over 10 years as a beauty ... Iles Formula stands out as a breakout premium haircare label delivering dramatic renewal results more akin to a intensive treatment than everyday products. Launched in 2015 by celebrity hairstylist Wendy Iles to satisfy unmet demand from clients, the brand has skyrocketed to cult status on the back of visibly healthier, shinier, more beautiful hair transformations.
